mapper.select: SELECT re_seq as seq, re_num as user_num, re_subject as subject, re_hashtag as hash_tag, re_hit as hit, date_format(re_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff(now(), re_date) wgap, re_book_img_url as book_img_url, re_book_title as book_title, user_name FROM review_board INNER JOIN tb_user ON re_num = user_num ORDER BY re_seq desc

SELECT re_seq as seq, re_subject as subject, re_num as user_num, re_content as content, re_hashtag as hash_tag, re_hit as hit, re_date as wdate, re_book_img_url as book_img_url, re_book_info_url as book_info_url, re_book_title as book_title, re_book_author as book_author, re_book_publisher as book_publisher, re_book_summary as book_summary FROM review_board WHERE re_seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET re_hit = re_hit + 1 WHERE re_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board ( re_seq, re_subject, re_num, re_content, re_hashtag, re_hit, re_date, re_book_img_url, re_book_info_url, re_book_title, re_book_author, re_book_publisher, re_book_summary ) VALUES ( 0, #{subject}, #{user_num}, #{content}, #{hash_tag}, 0, now(), #{book_img_url}, #{book_info_url}, #{book_title}, #{book_author}, #{book_publisher}, #{book_summary} );
mapper.select: SELECT re_seq, re_subject, re_num, re_content, re_hashtag, re_hit, re_date, re_book_img_url, re_book_info_url, re_book_title, re_book_author, re_book_publisher, re_book_summary FROM review_board WHERE re_seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET re_subject = #{subject}, re_content = #{content}, re_hashtag = #{hash_tag}, re_book_img_url = #{book_img_url}, re_book_info_url = #{book_info_url}, re_book_title = #{book_title}, re_book_author = #{book_author}, re_book_publisher = #{book_publisher}, re_book_summary = #{book_summary} WHERE re_seq = #{seq} AND re_num = #{user_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_board WHERE re_seq = #{seq} AND re_num = #{user_num}
